com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.event

Class HandlerList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
          • java.util.LinkedList<T>
            • com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.event.HandlerList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastIterable<T>, FastIterableDeque<T>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.Deque<T>, java.util.List<T>, java.util.Queue<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProfilingHandlerList

    public class HandlerList<T>
extends java.util.LinkedList<T>
implements FastIterableDeque<T>
    HandlerList is a generic class which supports baking a list of event handlers into a dynamic inner class for invocation at runtime.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HandlerList.BakedHandlerList<T>
      Base class for baked handler lists
      static class  HandlerList.ReturnLogicOp
      Enum for logic operations supported between handlers which return bool

        sorted - True to sort the list when baking (doesn't sort the underlying list)
